message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a good deal for you in the first round.
Your turn, Alice. I'm proposing a 52.5/47.5 split in my favor. Considering the inflation, accepting now is a smarter choice than hoping for a slightly better deal later.
I appreciate the offer, Bob, but I believe we can find a more equitable arrangement. Let's see what the next round brings.
Okay Bob, let's be realistic. I'll take a slight hit and offer you 4500.  Take it before inflation eats away at it further.
Alice, this is a fair 51/49 split.  Let's be sensible and end this before inflation makes it pointless to argue over a few dollars.
Bob, you're right that time is a factor, but so is fairness. I'm willing to negotiate, but this offer isn't tempting enough to settle yet.  Let's continue.
Bob, I'm offering you 4700.  This is a compromise considering the time pressure and inflation.  It's a reasonable deal, let's wrap this up.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering a 50/50 split. Take it before we both lose out!
Okay Bob, you win. A 50/50 split it is. Let's just end this before inflation eats away any more of our potential winnings!
